meaning_str.bing:
n. 命运；天意；命中注定的事（尤指坏事）；命运的安排
网络. 黑暗史诗；宿命；命运之夜

命运；天意；命中注定的事（尤指坏事）；命运的安排
黑暗史诗；宿命；命运之夜

命运；天意；天命；天数；定数；宿命；终局；结果；命运的安排；预定的结局；命中注定的事
注定；预定；使注定发生；决定（某人或某事的未来）

1.en: But every beginning is only a continuation and the book of fate is always open in the middle.
1.cn: 每个开始毕竟都只是续篇，而充满情节的书本总是从一半开始看起。

2.en: To be our fate seems only to repair so much, I think this for two days at the poles of suffering, are really his mother!
2.cn: 可我们的缘份似乎只修来这么多，想想我这两天在那电线杆下的苦等，还真他娘的傻！

3.en: Qing may have failed to achieve huge changes at the factory, but the episode encouraged her to take her fate into her own hands.
3.cn: 青桐或许未能促使那家工厂做出重大改变，但这段经历激励她一定要掌握自己的命运。

0.en: So I'm just gonna leave it entirely up to the gods of fate.

1.en: Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to face your fate.
1.cn: 你可以选择是否接受你的任务，那就是直面你的命运。

2.en: It was carrying a secret cargo, which would have changed our planets fate.
2.cn: 其上装载了神秘货物，它能改变整个星球的命运。

3.en: And did my best to avoid the speccy-spotty fate that Helen had predicted for me.
3.cn: 尽力避免海伦预言的成为青春痘四眼妹的命运。

4.en: He was meant to rendezvous with me here on Earth, before fate waylaid us both.
4.cn: 在命运将我们都打败之前他本该和我在地球会合。

5.en: However, the components of the universe can still affect its eventual fate.
5.cn: 然而组成宇宙的各个部分同时也会影响其最终的命运。

6.en: The fate of the country will be decided tonight and I can't be seen at your side.
6.cn: 今晚是决定这个国家的命运的时候，我无法抽空去见你。

7.en: All right, believe it or not, the fate of the entire damn human race might depend on it.
7.cn: 好吧，不管你信不信，整个人类的命运可全靠它了。

8.en: The film Interstellar deals with the quest for new worlds and the fate of humanity.
8.cn: 电影《星际穿越》讲述的是对新世界和人类命运的探索。

9.en: Why? For what? Why do you walk on the wire? Why do you tempt fate? Why do you risk death?
9.cn: 为什么？你为什么要走钢索？为什么要挑战命运？为什么冒险送死？

10.en: And now I see the fate of the world hangs on idiots like me. And that, sir, is sort of terrifying.
10.cn: 可现在，我意识到全世界的命运掌握在我这样的白痴手里，这件事，先生，让我有些害怕。

11.en: Silence. I assure you that were you in Slytherin, and your fate rested with me the both of you would be on the train home tonight. As it is...
11.cn: 住口。我向你们保证，如果你们是史莱哲林的学生，而我有权力决定你们的命运时，你们两个，保证今晚就得搭列车回家。而且……

12.en: And suffered the same fate. It's a disappointing end to her story, isn't it?
12.cn: 结果落得相同的下场，真是个令人遗憾的结局，对吧？

13.en: Have you made your decision regarding the fate of your father and uncle? No, Lord Kublai.
13.cn: 你决定了吗？如何处置你父亲和你叔叔？还没有，忽必烈大汗。

14.en: So you see, you can't quit. The fate of Bikini Bottom rests in your hands. But we're just…
14.cn: 你们看，你们不能退出。比基尼岛的未来就在你们手中。但是，但是我们只是……

15.en: And anyone who stands in our way will suffer the same fate as these men you see before you.
15.cn: 任何阻挡我们的人类，下场都会和你们面前看到的这些人一样。

16.en: Two, you let me walk away to an uncertain fate. You use the disk as bait to trap Lane. But some part of you suspect you've met your match.
16.cn: 第二，你放我走，让我去面对未知的一切，接着用这个硬盘去引诱莱恩上钩，但是你内心深处又害怕棋逢敌手。

17.en: While it might sound depressing living in a universe that will end its lifetime cold and devoid of life, the end fate of our universe actually has a beautiful symmetry to its hot, fiery beginning.
17.cn: 尽管这听起来让人觉得生活在宇宙之中十分沮丧，因为它将在寒冷和了无生气中走向灭亡，但宇宙最终冰冷的消亡却完美地与其火热的发端相称。
